name: Onion (kameia)
description:
Game made for LD48 (Solo Jam)

First ever game jam, had to scrap my previous idea and came up with this as an alternative.  The only buttons you'll need are 'ENTER' and 'ESCAPE'.

How to play:

  1.  Hit 'ENTER' when the pointer on the bottom of the display points to a gap in the circle.
  2. Successfully hitting 'ENTER' between the gap will give you 1 score.

To quit the game, simply hit 'ESCAPE'.
